Unknown.translation: If eyes get tongue and ears, then whatever it sees and hears with ears, it will then describe the reality and convey it.

Unknown.translation: If by the kindness of Almighty, the ears get tongue and eyes, then they will speak with tongue, what they see with eyes and hear.
